attributes.action: Provide a pedestrian/school crossing to outside of the school on the main road
attributes.additional_details: The school does not have the funds to be able to hire a lollipop person or anyone to help with pedestrian crossing. By putting a zebra crossing or child friendly area to cross this would reduce risk and families in the area would feel more safe.
attributes.background: Create a crossing to improve the safety of the children crossing in the area as it is a main road and there have been many incidents and close calls for children not being able to see around the corner when cars approach fast by the school.
